sentence: As a senior member of the Senate Appropriations Committee, Senator Murray was instrumental in ensuring that FVPSA funding was included in the CARES Act and has long made addressing domestic and family violence a priority.

Senator Murray was instrumental in securing more $3.5 billion for child care nationwide in the coronavirus aid package and secured crucial funding increases in the 2019 and 2020 Labor, HHS and Education Appropriations bills for the Child Care and Development Block Grant.
